MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the TD7 postcode area of Selkirk is still ongoing. This is due to excavation difficulties on site and we now expect power to be back on by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.43pm on the 15th of April 2021.
